node_content_widget module¶

A module containing base class for Node’s content graphical representation. It also contains examples of overriden Text widget which can pass it’s parent notification about currently being modified.

class node_editor.node_content_widget.NodeContentWidget(node: Node, parent: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QWidget = None)¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QWidget, node_editor.node_serializable.Serializable

Class docs

Default constructor

Parameters

  • node (Node) – Node currently holding the content.

  • parent (QWidget) – parent widget in which the content is displayed

deserialize(data: dict, hashmap: dict = {}, restore_id: bool = True) → bool¶

Default deserialize method.

To be overriden by user.

Parameters

  • data (dict) – data used to deserialize

  • hashmap (dict) – hashmap containing connection between nodes, edges

Returns

  • True if sucessful

  • False if failed
